titleStmt.title: A Coole conference between the cleared Reformation and the Apologeticall narration brought together by a well-willer to both.

notesStmt.note: "Reformation of church government in Scotland cleered from some mistakes was written by Alexander Henderson in defense of the Scottish commissioners. The Apologeticall narration was written by Thomas Goodwin and other independents."--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Wing dates this [1643] but the Reformation was published in 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
